message.content:
First, examine the provided cash flow statement to locate the line item related to the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents.

This line item indicates the cash and cash equivalents at the start of the period.  

Therefore, the value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is **8000000.00**.
